mapper.select: select f.relation_id, f.user_id, u.username, u.number, u.avatar_url, n.content, n.created_at, f.status from friends f join users u on f.user_id = u.user_id join notifications n on n.related_id = f.relation_id where f.friend_id = #{userId} and n.type = 'friend'

SELECT f.relation_id AS relationId, IF(f.user_id = #{userId}, f.friend_id, f.user_id) AS friendId, f.status AS relationStatus, u.username, u.number, u.avatar_url AS avatarUrl, u.status AS userStatus, MAX(m.sent_time) AS lastMessageTime FROM friends f JOIN users u ON (f.user_id = #{userId} AND u.user_id = f.friend_id) OR (f.friend_id = #{userId} AND u.user_id = f.user_id) LEFT JOIN messages m ON ((f.user_id = m.sender_id AND f.friend_id = m.receiver_id AND m.deleted_by_sender = 0) OR (f.user_id = m.receiver_id AND f.friend_id = m.sender_id AND m.deleted_by_receiver = 0)) WHERE (f.user_id = #{userId} OR f.friend_id = #{userId}) AND f.status = 1 GROUP BY f.relation_id, f.user_id, f.friend_id, f.status, u.username, u.number, u.avatar_url, u.status ORDER BY lastMessageTime DESC;
SELECT CASE WHEN user_id = #{userId} THEN friend_id WHEN friend_id = #{userId} THEN user_id END AS result FROM friends WHERE relation_id = #{relationId};
